description: ControllerManagerComponentConfiguration contains the component configuration for the Gardener controller manager

config.description: Config specifies values for the Gardener Controller Manager component configuration Please see example/20-componentconfig-gardener-controller-manager.yaml for what can be configured here

tls.description: TLS configures the HTTPS server of the Gardener Controller Manager uses http for /healthz endpoint, optionally serves HTTPS for metrics. If left empty, generates a certificate signed by the CA that also signs the TLS serving certificates of the Gardener API server.
